exec: // Fill 6 transaction dates for the Meter Values
// Fill 6 transaction dates for the Meter Values
// Fill 6 transaction dates for the Meter Values

body.raw:
<s:Envelope xmlns:a="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing" xmlns:s="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope">
  <s:Header>
    <a:Action s:mustUnderstand="1">/MeterValues</a:Action>
    <h:chargeBoxIdentity xmlns="urn://Ocpp/Cs/2012/06/" xmlns:h="urn://Ocpp/Cs/2012/06/">{{chargingStation}}</h:chargeBoxIdentity>
    <a:From>
      <a:Address>{{base_url}}:8081/ChargeBox/Ocpp</a:Address>
    </a:From>
    <a:MessageID>urn:uuid:b31235d2-42dc-4195-8e01-50f508593ce1</a:MessageID>
    <a:ReplyTo>
      <a:Address>http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing/anonymous</a:Address>
    </a:ReplyTo>
  </s:Header>
  <s:Body xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
    <meterValuesRequest xmlns="urn://Ocpp/Cs/2012/06/">
      <connectorId>{{connectorId}}</connectorId>
      <transactionId>{{transactionId}}</transactionId>
      <values>
        <timestamp>{{dateTransaction1}}</timestamp>
        <value unit="Wh" location="Outlet" measurand="Energy.Active.Import.Register" format="Raw" context="Sample.Periodic">
        	10400
        </value>
      </values>
    </meterValuesRequest>
  </s:Body>
</s:Envelope>
